name: Dick Figures Season 1
summary: Red and Blue are friends. Kind of. They're also enemies. Definitely. They're just like me and you: they surf the internet, they play videogames, they fight mega-huge-fire-breathing-dragon-turtles with samurai swords. Pretty typical stuff. Without jobs or much prospect for sexual salvation the two often become tagled in bizzare shenanigans as they battle the burning question of their time: what the hell are we going to do today?
info:
• 中文名: 猥琐传说 第一季
  • 话数: 10
  • 放送开始: 2010
  • 官方网站: http://dickfigures.wikia.com/wiki/Dick_Figures_Wiki
  • 播放电视台: Youtube

eps.name: A Bee or Something
eps.desc: Blue got dumped. He's having a bad day. Red's voice becomes auto-tuned. Now he's having a worse day.

eps.name: Panda Hat
eps.desc: Red got drunk in a bar and made a birthday party.

eps.name: Flame Wars
eps.desc: Red and Blue turn a simple video game shopping spree to a black-ops killing spree.

eps.name: Traffic Jams
eps.desc: Red drives Blue insane in the fast lane to nowhere.

eps.name: Steakosaurus
eps.desc: Red and Blue decide to feed themselves the old-fashioned way - hunting, killing and time-traveling.

eps.name: Trouble Date
eps.desc: Blue and Pink's romantic meal is ruined when Red gets his salad tossed.

eps.name: Role Playas
eps.desc: Cerulean (aka Blue) hopes to gain +4 charisma points by saving Pinkcess from the Evil King Richard Figures the Long Shaft.

eps.name: Attack of the Pwns
eps.desc: Space - where the forces of evil (Blue) battle the forces of evil-er (Red) for dominion over the galaxy or a frozen burrito or whatever.
